question:
Which among the following is/ are the objectives of Pradhan Mantri Khanij Kshetra Kalyan Yojana?
1. To conduct various development and welfare project
2. To nullify the adverse impact of mining on the environment and health
3. To improve the quality of life near mining areas
Choose the correct codes from the options given below :
explanation: Objectives of Pradhan Mantri Khanij Kshetra Kalyan Yojana- To conduct various development and welfare project in mining-affected areas, To reduce the adverse impact of mining on environment and health in mining districts, To ensure substantial improvement in the quality of life near mining areas.
